about_the_game:
Make The Beast eat all the other players, that's the point of the game.

But!
There is more...

All players start on the arena awaiting for The Beast to spawn. One of the players have a mark on them. The Beast will always try to get to the player that is marked with its slippy movement, and devour them the second its prey will be in range. Marked character needs to pass it to someone else so that he will not be the one that will be eaten.

Players can use their three abilities to aid themselves or bring other players closer to Beast's jaws! Feed The Beast has many characters, and all of them with different abilities and play-styles!

Are you ready to face the beast? Will you be the one standing while all others have been devoured? Will you achieve greatness in this fast-paced, arcade, action experience?!

You should...

Because this game is extremely uber cool (￣~ o￣)~
